channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2023100432
item.description:
Report X-2023100432

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-02
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN HAWAII ONE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED WET FROM RAIN. DURING PACKAGE REWRAP EIGHT FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF VELVET SPRAY WERE DISCOVERED. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM NEW JERSEY USING UPS ACCOUNT 150479, KEREKES BAKERY EQUIPMENT, 6103 15TH AVE, BROOKLYN NY 11219.
